summary: This is an email chain from July 2, 2020, between FBI personnel discussing the arrest and processing of Ghislaine Maxwell. It indicates she is being taken to Merrimack County Jail and will have her initial court appearance via Skype with the District of New Hampshire.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; she is being taken to Merrimack County jail for processing and will have an initial court appearance.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: An FBI Special Agent in New York who sends an email update on Maxwell's status and processing.

events.title: Arrest and Processing of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is being taken to Merrimack County jail for processing following her arrest. Her initial court appearance is scheduled to be conducted via Skype with the District of New Hampshire.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested and in custody as of July 2, 2020.
She was being processed at Merrimack County Jail.
Her initial court appearance was scheduled to be conducted remotely via Skype.
The communication is between FBI personnel, specifically involving the FBI New York office and the Office of Public Affairs.
